summary: Tested 3-plan subscription system (Free/Plus/Unlimited). All backend APIs working correctly. Frontend SubscriptionSection displays correct plan badges, usage counters, and upgrade dialog with Plus and Unlimited options.
critical_code_review_comments: Fixed missing i18n key 'subscription.benefits' in Spanish, English, and Portuguese translations

test_credentials.note: DEV_MODE enabled - OTP from backend logs

seed_data_creation: Created test users for subscription testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: 3-plan subscription system fully tested. Backend tests in /app/backend/tests/test_subscription_3plans.py cover: plan-status endpoint returns correct limits (free=1/1, plus=2/5, unlimited=null), set-plan accepts free/plus/unlimited, plan transitions work correctly. Frontend SubscriptionSection shows correct badges, usage counters (X/1 for free, X/5 for plus), and upgrade dialog with Plus and Unlimited plan cards.

backend: GET /api/user/plan-status returns correct limits per plan (free=1/1, plus=2/5, unlimited=null) ✓
Plan transitions: free→plus→unlimited→free all work correctly ✓
Legacy upgrade-premium endpoint sets plan to 'plus' ✓
frontend: SubscriptionSection shows usage counters (albums X/1, chats X/1 for free) ✓
Upgrade dialog shows Plus and Unlimited plan cards ✓
Plan benefits displayed correctly for each plan ✓
i18n: All 6 languages have subscription.free, subscription.plus, subscription.unlimited keys ✓
All 6 languages have freeBenefits, plusBenefits, unlimitedBenefits sections ✓
Added missing 'benefits' key to Spanish, English, Portuguese ✓

mocked_apis.note: Plan upgrades are MOCKED (no real Stripe payment)
mocked_endpoints: POST /api/user/set-plan - Directly sets plan without payment verification
